biotools.summary: Knowledgebase for rice sheath blight information (KRiShI) is a manually curated user-friendly knowledgebase for rice sheath blight (SB) disease that allows users to efficiently mine, visualize, search, benchmark, download, and update meaningful data and information related to SB using its easy and interactive interface.

bioschemas.name: KRiShI
